main event: Two objects were observed in Bexley, Ohio over a period of approximately one hour and fifteen minutes.
interesting points: The objects were described as round on top and flat on the bottom and appeared white and glowing during the sighting., Witnesses reported seeing the objects moving in different directions before they disappeared., One object was observed rising and then slanted unnaturally straight up., The sighting was categorized as a ground-visual observation., There was some speculation that the objects could be misidentified natural phenomena, such as Venus or meteorological effects.
witness description: The witness is described as a housewife and is considered reliable and sincere.
